channel.title: logs on Docker | IT Quicktasks
channel.description: Recent content in logs on Docker | IT Quicktasks

item.title: Check Logs of a Container
item.description: docker logs <friendly-name|container-id> You can tail it much like tailing ordinary logs: docker logs -f --tail=5 <friendly-name|container-id> which means: “start tailing at current last 5 entries of the logs”
